intro.title: haex-vault Developer Documentation
intro.subtitle: Everything you need to build powerful extensions for haex-vault.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.intro: Welcome to the haex-vault developer documentation. Here you'll find comprehensive guides and documentation to help you start building extensions for haex-vault.
welcome.content: Whether you're building your first extension or looking to explore advanced features, this documentation will guide you through the process.

whatIsHaex.title: What is haex-vault?
whatIsHaex.intro: haex-vault is a secure, encrypted storage platform that syncs your data across all your devices. Extensions allow you to add custom functionality and integrate with external services while maintaining the security and privacy you expect.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.intro: Extensions are sandboxed applications that run inside haex-vault. They can access your data through a secure API, providing powerful functionality while keeping your data safe.
extensions.content: Each extension runs in its own isolated environment with only the permissions you explicitly grant. Extensions are cryptographically signed to ensure authenticity and integrity.

capabilities.title: What extensions can do:
capabilities.database: Store and query data using SQLite with CRDT sync support
capabilities.storage: Persist settings and preferences using key-value storage
capabilities.filesystem: Save and open files through native dialogs
capabilities.web: Make HTTP requests to external APIs
capabilities.security: All operations are sandboxed with granular permissions

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.intro: Ready to build your first extension? Start with these guides:

security.title: Sandboxed Security
security.description: Extensions run in isolated environments with explicit permissions
